io.simplesource.saga.action.sourcing

Class SourcingApp<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.simplesource.saga.action.sourcing.SourcingApp<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - action command type.

    public final class SourcingApp<A>
extends Object
    SourcingApp is an action processor that turns saga action requests into Simple Sourcing action requests. It gets the latest sequence id from the stream of command responses for the aggregate. It then forwards the Simple Sourcing command response back to the sagas coordinator.
